snippet: State Senator Pam Roach had been removed from the Republican caucus in 2010 after repeated clashes with fellow lawmakers and staff members.
abstract: Washington State Senator Pam Roach, once shunned by her fellow Republicans due to her volatile temper, has been embraced in order for the Republican caucus to exercise its control over the state's budget process with a one-vote majority.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Pam Roach had been removed from the Republican caucus in 2010 after repeated clashes with fellow lawmakers and staff members.

headline.seo: Washington Legislator Allowed to Rejoin Her Caucus
headline.main: Once-Shunned Washington Legislator Is Embraced in Budget Vote
headline.print_headline: Once-Shunned Washington Legislator Is Embraced in Budget Vote
